content.en:
**WebAssembly (Wasm)** has evolved from a browser-only technology into a universal runtime targeting edge computing, serverless, plugin systems, and embedded devices. In 2026, the ecosystem has matured significantly with the stabilization of the Component Model, widespread WASI adoption, and growing language support beyond C/C++ and Rust.

This report examines the current state of WebAssembly, key developments, ecosystem tools, and future directions based on analysis of multiple authoritative sources.
content.zh:
**WebAssembly (Wasm)** 已从一项仅限浏览器的技术演变为面向边缘计算、Serverless、插件系统和嵌入式设备的通用运行时。2026年，随着组件模型（Component Model）的稳定、WASI 的广泛采用以及 C/C++ 和 Rust 之外更多语言的支持，生态系统已显著成熟。

本报告基于多个权威来源的分析，审视了 WebAssembly 的现状、关键进展、生态工具和未来方向。

description.en: The WebAssembly Component Model reached Phase 4 status, enabling language-agnostic module composition
description.zh: WebAssembly 组件模型达到第 4 阶段，实现了语言无关的模块组合

description.en: Major cloud providers now support WASI P2 for serverless workloads with sub-millisecond cold starts
description.zh: 主要云厂商已支持 WASI P2 用于 Serverless 工作负载，冷启动时间低于毫秒级

description.en: Latest benchmarks show Wasm achieving 95-98% of native performance for compute-heavy workloads
description.zh: 最新基准测试显示，Wasm 在计算密集型工作负载上达到原生性能的 95-98%

description.en: Go, Python, Kotlin, and Swift now have mature Wasm compilation targets alongside Rust and C/C++
description.zh: Go、Python、Kotlin 和 Swift 已拥有成熟的 Wasm 编译目标，与 Rust 和 C/C++ 并驾齐驱

description.en: Write code in Rust, Go, Python, C/C++, or other supported languages
description.zh: 使用 Rust、Go、Python、C/C++ 或其他支持的语言编写代码

description.en: Compile to .wasm module using language-specific toolchain (cargo, tinygo, emscripten)
description.zh: 使用语言特定工具链（cargo、tinygo、emscripten）编译为 .wasm 模块

description.en: Use Component Model to compose modules with WIT interfaces
description.zh: 使用组件模型和 WIT 接口组合模块

description.en: Run on browser, edge, server, or embedded target via WASI-compatible runtime
description.zh: 通过 WASI 兼容运行时在浏览器、边缘、服务器或嵌入式目标上运行

content.en: The Component Model is the most transformative addition to WebAssembly. It enables cross-language module composition, meaning a Rust library can be seamlessly used from Python or Go code running in Wasm.
content.zh: 组件模型是 WebAssembly 最具变革性的新增功能。它实现了跨语言模块组合，意味着 Rust 库可以被运行在 Wasm 中的 Python 或 Go 代码无缝使用。

label.zh: 使用 Wasm 的 npm 包

description.en: Wasm is becoming the universal binary format for portable, sandboxed execution across all platforms
description.zh: Wasm 正在成为跨平台可移植沙箱执行的通用二进制格式

description.en: Enabling safe, language-agnostic plugin systems for editors, databases, and infrastructure tools
description.zh: 为编辑器、数据库和基础设施工具提供安全的、语言无关的插件系统

text.en: WebAssembly in 2026 is no longer just about the browser. It's a portable, secure, fast execution environment that runs everywhere from CDN edge nodes to embedded IoT devices.
text.zh: 2026 年的 WebAssembly 不再仅仅关乎浏览器。它是一个可移植、安全、快速的执行环境，从 CDN 边缘节点到嵌入式 IoT 设备无处不在。

disclaimer.en: This report was generated by AI using web sources. Verify critical information independently.
disclaimer.zh: 本报告由 AI 基于网络来源生成，请独立验证关键信息。
